options.title: Transmitter
options.description: Rosemount Temperature Transmitter offer innovative, industry-leading technologies engineered to accomodate tough environments and challenging application.

options.title: X-well
options.description: Rosemount X-well technology measures process temperature accurately and reliably without thermowell.

options.title: Flow
options.description: Flow Measurement is the process of measuring fluid in your plant or industry. You can measure flow through a variety of different devices such as Coriolis, Differential Pressure, Vortex, Magnetic, Ultrasonic, Turbine and positive displacement meters.

options.title: Density
options.description: Our density & viscosity measurement devices offer unbeatableperformance for applications in alcohol concentration, API gravity, specific gravity and more.

options.title: Viscosity
options.description: Our inline viscosity meter offers accurate repeatable measurement in industries such as refining chemical, life Science and more.
